page.title: 16Birchwood Library
page.content: Birchwood library opened in October l985.In the first few weeks they issued over 8000 books.The library shares the same site as the High School.It is the school library as well as a public library.There are 2 classrooms which all the schools may use. The rooms can also be hired out for private meetings.The library has 22000 books which have a special code on their back covers which enables the computor to read this code when the book is slid over the computor window. Each borrower has a computor ticket which enables him to borrow up to 8 books (children 4 books).The computors catelogue enables the librarians to locate a book quickly or find out which libary has the book requested. Books are issued for 3 weeks, overdue books incur a 2p per day fine.Tapes can be borrowed on payment of 25p.
